trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all strongly typed collections that manage <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todas as coleções fortemente tipadas que gerenciam <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The StateManagedCollection class is the base class for all strongly typed collections that store <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> elements, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>, and others.
trans-unit.target: A classe StateManagedCollection é a classe base para todas as coleções fortemente tipadas que armazenam <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>elementos, incluindo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>e outros.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The StateManagedCollection collection manages its own state as well as the state of the elements it contains.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de StateManagedCollection gerencia seu próprio estado, bem como o estado dos elementos que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> saves the state of the collection and the state of all the elements currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, uma chamada para <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>salva o estado da coleção e o estado de todos os elementos contidos no momento pela coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important methods to consider when deriving from the StateManagedCollection class are <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos mais importantes a considerar ao derivar da classe StateManagedCollection são <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> methods are used to store an index in view state for the type of a contained element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>métodos são usados para armazenar um índice em estado de exibição para o tipo de um elemento contido.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Storing an index rather than a fully qualified type name improves performance.
trans-unit.target: Armazenar um índice em vez de um nome de tipo totalmente qualificado melhora o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called whenever elements of the collection are manipulated, and validates the elements according to business rules.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método é chamado sempre que os elementos da coleção são manipulados e valida os elementos de acordo com as regras de negócio.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Currently, the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method prohibits `null` objects from being stored in the collection; however, you can override this method to define your own validation behavior in a derived type.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, a implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método proíbe `null` objetos sejam armazenados na coleção; no entanto, você pode substituir esse método para definir seu próprio comportamento de validação em um tipo derivado.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A> method forces the entire collection to be serialized to view state, rather than just serializing changes made to state since the last time it was loaded.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>método força toda a coleção a ser serializado para estado de exibição, em vez de serializar apenas as alterações feitas ao estado desde a última vez que foi carregado.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A> method is an abstract method you can implement to perform this same behavior at the element level.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>método é um método abstrato, você pode implementar para executar esse mesmo comportamento no nível de elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > StateManagedCollection stores assembly-qualified type names of the collection items in view state.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > StateManagedCollection armazena nomes de tipo qualificado por assembly dos itens da coleção em estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: A site visitor could decode the view state and retrieve the type name.
trans-unit.target: Um visitante do site foi possível decodificar o estado de exibição e recuperar o nome do tipo.

trans-unit.source: If this scenario creates a security concern in your Web site, you can manually encrypt the type name before placing it in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Se esse cenário cria uma preocupação de segurança no seu site da Web, você pode criptografar manualmente o nome do tipo antes de colocá-lo no estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override the constructor to provide customized implementation.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem substituir o construtor para fornecer a implementação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A> method is called before the Clear method is called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> method is called after Clear has finished removing elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>método é chamado antes do método Clear é chamado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A>método é chamado depois de limpar a remoção de elementos da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção para uma matriz, começando em um índice de matriz específico.

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: A matriz especificada deve ser de um tipo compatível.

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos são copiados para o <xref:System.Array>na mesma ordem em que o enumerador que itera por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados a partir de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos contidos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos contidos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of a class that implements <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma instância de uma classe que implementa <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of object created is based on the specified member of the collection returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*> method.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto criado se baseia o membro especificado da coleção retornada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: The CreateKnownType method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateKnownType é chamado internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>coleção em sua implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived collections override the CreateKnownType method to return a default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> type identified by the provided `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas substituem o método CreateKnownType para retornar uma instância padrão do <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>tipo identificado pela fornecido `index`, que é mapeado para um dos tipos retornados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The index, from the ordered list of types returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>, of the type of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O índice, na lista ordenada de tipos retornados por <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>, do tipo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> criem.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class derived from , according to the index provided.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de uma classe derivada de , acordo para o index fornecido.

trans-unit.source: In all cases when not overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos quando não substituídas em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um iterador que itera por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que pode ser usado para iterar por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> tipos que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção pode conter.

trans-unit.source: The GetKnownTypes method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método GetKnownTypes é chamado internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>coleção em sua implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived collections override the GetKnownTypes method to return an array of <xref:System.Type> objects that represent the types the collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas substituem o método de GetKnownTypes para retornar uma matriz de <xref:System.Type>objetos que representam os tipos de coleção pode conter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An ordered array of <xref:System.Type> objects that identify the types of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects the collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz ordenada de <xref:System.Type>que identificam os tipos de objetos <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> objetos a coleção pode conter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*> method removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>método Remove todos os itens da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnClear method to perform any additional work before all items are removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnClear para executar qualquer trabalho adicional antes de todos os itens são removidos da coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*> method finishes removing all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional após o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>método terminar a remoção de todos os itens da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear*>

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnClearComplete method to perform any additional work after all items are removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnClearComplete para executar qualquer trabalho adicional depois que todos os itens são removidos da coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> method adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> método adiciona um item à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnInsert method to perform any additional work before an item is added to the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnInsert para executar qualquer trabalho adicional antes de um item é adicionado à coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` devem ser inseridos pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> method adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional após o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> método adiciona um item à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnInsertComplete method to perform any additional work after an item is added to the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnInsertComplete para executar qualquer trabalho adicional depois que um item é adicionado à coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` é inserido o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The object inserted into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto inserido o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> método Remove o item especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnRemove method to perform any additional work before an item is removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnRemove para executar qualquer trabalho adicional antes de um item é removido da coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do item a ser removido, que é usado quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser removido do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>, que é usado quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs additional work after the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa o trabalho adicional após o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> método Remove o item especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> can override the OnRemoveComplete method to perform any additional work after an item is removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>pode substituir o método OnRemoveComplete para executar qualquer trabalho adicional depois que um item é removido da coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do item a ser removido, que é usado quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23RemoveAt%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The object removed from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>, which is used when <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O objeto removido o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>, que é usado quando <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Remove%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates an element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, valida um elemento de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method is called to validate the object manipulated through the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface methods.
trans-unit.target: O método OnValidate é chamado para validar o objeto manipulado por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>implementação do <xref:System.Collections.IList>métodos de interface.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is to verify that the object manipulated by the collection is not `null`; however, collections derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> override the OnValidate method to perform any additional validation, such as type-checking.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão é verificar se o objeto manipulado pela coleção não está `null`; no entanto, coleções derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>Substituir o método OnValidate para executar qualquer validação adicional, como verificação de tipo.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> to validate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> para validar.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Forces the entire <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection to be serialized into view state.
trans-unit.target: Força a todo o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção a ser serializado em estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method forces the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection to be serialized completely (whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method saves only the change information).
trans-unit.target: O força do método SetDirty o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>coleção a ser serializada completamente (enquanto o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>método salva as informações de alteração).</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a collection has changed in a significant way and change information is insufficient to recreate the object in memory from view state.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando uma coleção foi alterada de forma significativa e informações de alteração são suficientes para recriar o objeto na memória do estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, instructs an <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> contained by the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, instrui um <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> contidas na coleção para registrar seu estado inteiro para o estado de exibição, em vez de gravação apenas alterar informações.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirtyObject method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método SetDirtyObject é chamado internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Collections%23IList%23Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> that should serialize itself completely.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> que deve serializar ele mesmo completamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos contidos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção é sincronizada (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um iterador que itera por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que pode ser usado para iterar por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um item para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A> methods are called before the element is added to the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the element is added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A>métodos forem chamados antes que o elemento é adicionado à coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>método é chamado depois que o elemento é adicionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The<xref uid="langword_csharp_ object " name=" object " href=""></xref>to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The<xref uid="langword_csharp_ object " name=" object " href=""></xref>to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o novo elemento foi inserido.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method is called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> method is called after <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> has finished removing elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método é chamado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A>método é chamado após <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>terminou a remoção de elementos da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClearComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção contém um valor específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the collection is checked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método é chamado para validar `value` antes da coleção é verificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> para localizar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto for encontrado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed for the value parameter, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é passado para o parâmetro de valor, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specified item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice de um item especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método é chamado para validar `value` antes que o índice seja retornado.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser localizado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of value, if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do value , se ele está localizado na lista; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um item para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `index` is -1, `value` is appended to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` é -1, `value` é anexado ao início do <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` é igual ao número de itens na coleção, `value` é acrescentado ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Especificado index está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> é somente leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do elemento a ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Especificado index está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência do objeto especificado por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the value is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método é chamado para validar `value` antes que o valor é removido da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>método é chamado antes do objeto é removido e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>método é chamado depois que o objeto é removido.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser removido do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate `value` before the value is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>método é chamado para validar `value` antes que o valor é removido da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>método é chamado antes do objeto é removido e o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>método é chamado depois que o objeto é removido.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do item a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção está salvando alterações ao seu estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is marked to save its own state and the state of all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> items it contains; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coleção está marcada para salvar seu próprio estado e o estado de todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> itens que ele contém; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> items it contains.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o estado de exibição salvo anteriormente do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleção e o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> itens que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método restaura as informações de estado de exibição que foi salvo pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Estado de exibição é o acúmulo dos valores de propriedades de um controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores são colocados automaticamente em do controle de servidor <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>propriedade, que é uma ocorrência da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Valor desta propriedade é mantido, em seguida, para um objeto de cadeia de caracteres depois de salvar o estágio do ciclo de vida de controle do servidor de estado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir este método para especificar como um controle de servidor personalizado restaura o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do gerenciamento de estado ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the collection and collection elements' state to restore.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a coleção e o estado de elementos da coleção para restaurar.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and each <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> object it contains since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Salva as alterações para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleta e cada <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> objeto contém desde a hora a página foi postado no servidor.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Estado de exibição é o acúmulo dos valores de propriedades de um controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores são colocados automaticamente em do controle de servidor <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>propriedade, que é uma ocorrência da <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Valor desta propriedade é mantido, em seguida, para um objeto de cadeia de caracteres depois de salvar o estágio do ciclo de vida de controle do servidor de estado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML hidden element (`<input type="hidden">`).
trans-unit.target: Quando o estado de exibição for salvo, esse objeto de cadeia de caracteres é retornado ao cliente como uma variável que é armazenada em um elemento oculto HTML (`<input type="hidden">`).

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você criar controles de servidor personalizado, você pode melhorar a eficiência ao substituir esse método e modificar seu controle de servidor <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and[ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) e[visão geral do gerenciamento de estado ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> and the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que contém as alterações no estado de exibição do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> e os itens que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the collection and its elements, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estado de exibição é associado a coleção e seus elementos, este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"></xref> collection and each of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> objects it contains to track changes to their view state so they can be persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection"> </xref> coleta e cada a <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> objetos que ela contém para controlar as alterações para o estado de exibição para que eles podem ser persistentes entre solicitações para a mesma página.
